China: The Hongwu Emperor abolished the office of chancellor and took over direct control of the Three Departments and Six Ministries.
France: Charles V died. He was succeeded by his son Charles VI.
Peru: Inca Roca died. His heir Quispe Yupanqui was killed in a coup, and the throne went to Yáhuar Huácac, another son.
Philippine: Sheikh Karim-ul Makhdum arrives in Jolo and builds a Mosque.
Russia: Battle of Kulikovo: A Muscovite force defeated a significantly larger Blue Horde army of Mongolia at Kulikovo Field.
